CustomField.formula: CCS_account_merge_ID__c & MID("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,1,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,2,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,3,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,4,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,4,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,5,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,16,0) )+1,1) & MID("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,6,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,7,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,8,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,4,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,9,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,10,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,16,0) )+1,1) & MID("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ012345",( IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,11,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,1,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,12,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,2,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,13,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,4,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,14,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,8,0) +IF(FIND(MID(CCS_account_merge_ID__c,15,1), "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")>0,16,0) )+1,1)
